verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our Savior, <S%G4990><s%> and of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> [who is] our hope; <S%G1680><s%>

to Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> [my] true <S%G1103><s%> child <S%G5043><s%> in [the] faith: <S%G4102><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> [and] peace <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

As I urged <S%G3870><s%> you upon my departure <S%G4198><s%> for Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> remain <S%G4357><s%> on at Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that you may instruct <S%G3853><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> men <S%G5100><s%> not to teach <S%G2085><s%> strange <S%G2085><s%> doctrines, <S%G2085><s%>

nor <S%G3366><s%> to pay <S%G4337><s%> attention <S%G4337><s%> to myths <S%G3454><s%> and endless <S%G562><s%> genealogies, <S%G1076><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> give <S%G3930><s%> rise <S%G3930><s%> to mere speculation <S%G7058><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> [furthering] the administration <S%G3622><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is by faith. <S%G4102><s%>

But the goal <S%G5056><s%> of our instruction <S%G3852><s%> is love <S%G26><s%> from a pure <S%G2513><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> and a good <S%G18><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> and a sincere <S%G505><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%>

For some <S%G5100><s%> men, <S%G5100><s%> straying <S%G795><s%> from these <S%G3739><s%> things, <S%G3739><s%> have turned <S%G1624><s%> aside <S%G1624><s%> to fruitless <S%G3150><s%> discussion, <S%G3150><s%>

wanting <S%G2309><s%> to be teachers <S%G3547><s%> of the Law, <S%G3547><s%> even though they do not understand <S%G3539><s%> either <S%G3383><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> they are saying <S%G3004><s%> or <S%G3383><s%> the matters about <S%G4012><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> they make <S%G1226><s%> confident <S%G1226><s%> assertions. <S%G1226><s%>
But we know <S%G3609><s%> that the Law <S%G3551><s%> is good, <S%G2570><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> uses <S%G5530><s%> it lawfully, <S%G3545><s%>

realizing <S%G3609><s%> the fact <S%G3778><s%> that law <S%G3551><s%> is not made <S%G2749><s%> for a righteous <S%G1342><s%> man, <S%G1342><s%> but for those who are lawless <S%G459><s%> and rebellious, <S%G506><s%> for the ungodly <S%G765><s%> and sinners, <S%G268><s%> for the unholy <S%G462><s%> and profane, <S%G952><s%> for those who kill <S%G3970><s%> <S%G3389><s%> their fathers <S%G3970><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> mothers, <S%G3389><s%> for murderers <S%G409><s%>

and immoral <S%G4205><s%> men <S%G4205><s%> and homosexuals <S%G733><s%> and kidnappers <S%G405><s%> and liars <S%G5583><s%> and perjurers, <S%G1965><s%> and whatever <S%G1487><s%> <S%G5100><s%> else <S%G2087><s%> is contrary <S%G480><s%> to sound <S%G5198><s%> teaching, <S%G1319><s%>
according <S%G2596><s%> to the glorious <S%G1391><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the blessed <S%G3107><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> I have been entrusted. <S%G4100><s%>

I thank <S%G5485><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who has strengthened <S%G1743><s%> me, because <S%G3754><s%> He considered <S%G2233><s%> me faithful, <S%G4103><s%> putting <S%G5087><s%> me into service; <S%G1248><s%>

even though I was formerly <S%G4387><s%> a blasphemer <S%G989><s%> and a persecutor <S%G1376><s%> and a violent <S%G5197><s%> aggressor. <S%G5197><s%> And yet <S%G235><s%> I was shown <S%G1653><s%> mercy, <S%G1653><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I acted <S%G4160><s%> ignorantly <S%G50><s%> in unbelief; <S%G570><s%>

and the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> was more <S%G5250><s%> than <S%G5250><s%> abundant, <S%G5250><s%> with the faith <S%G4102><s%> and love <S%G26><s%> which are [found] in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

It is a trustworthy <S%G4103><s%> statement, <S%G3056><s%> deserving <S%G514><s%> full <S%G3956><s%> acceptance, <S%G594><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into the world <S%G2889><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> among whom <S%G3739><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> foremost <S%G4413><s%> [of all.]

And yet <S%G235><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> I found <S%G1653><s%> mercy, <S%G1653><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that in me as the foremost, <S%G4413><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> might demonstrate <S%G1731><s%> His perfect <S%G537><s%> patience, <S%G3115><s%> as an example <S%G5296><s%> for those <S%G3588><s%> who would <S%G3195><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> in Him for eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to the King <S%G935><s%> eternal, <S%G165><s%> immortal, <S%G862><s%> invisible, <S%G517><s%> the only <S%G3441><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> [be] honor <S%G5092><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> command <S%G3852><s%> I entrust <S%G3908><s%> to you, Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> my son, <S%G5043><s%> in accordance <S%G2596><s%> with the prophecies <S%G4394><s%> previously <S%G4254><s%> made <S%G4254><s%> concerning <S%G1909><s%> you, that by them you may fight <S%G4754><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> fight, <S%G4752><s%>

keeping <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and a good <S%G18><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> have rejected <S%G683><s%> and suffered <S%G3489><s%> shipwreck <S%G3489><s%> in regard <S%G4012><s%> to their faith. <S%G4102><s%>

Among these <S%G3739><s%> are Hymenaeus <S%G5211><s%> and Alexander, <S%G223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have delivered <S%G3860><s%> over <S%G3860><s%> to Satan, <S%G4567><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that they may be taught <S%G3811><s%> not to blaspheme. <S%G987><s%>
